Up.Statement: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT i.name FROM sys.indexes AS i INNER JOIN sys.tables AS t ON i.object_id = t.object_id WHERE t.name = 'w2_UserPointHistory' AND i.name = 'IX_w2_UserPointHistory_1') CREATE INDEX [IX_w2_UserPointHistory_1] ON [dbo].[w2_UserPointHistory]([user_id], [history_no]) ON [PRIMARY] GO
